data.title: Madame Butterfly (1954 film)
data.meta_description: Madame Butterfly is a 1954 musical film directed by Carmine Gallone and starring Kaoru Yachigusa, Nicola Filacuridi and Michiko Tanaka. It is based on Giacomo Puccini's opera, Madama Butterfly which is based on David Belasco's short story of the same name.
